Please find attached the layout file for the new storage room for Guess DMM. Kindly organize the following actions to meet the target completion date of 01st January 2025:

 

@Maitha <mailto:Maitha.Alhashmi@chalhoub.com>  Please arrange for the setup of shelves. Measurements, including rails and shelves, are to be confirmed by @Majdi <mailto:Majdi.Elhakam@chalhoub.com> .

@Joseph <mailto:Joseph.Diaz@chalhoub.com>  Please arrange the internet equipment. We need to move the BOH PC to the storage room and provide a new laptop for the BOH in-store, as requested by @Majdi <mailto:Majdi.Elhakam@chalhoub.com> .

@Philip <mailto:Philip.abdou@chalhoub.com>  Please arrange for the installation of the CCTV system.

@Hagop <mailto:Hagop.Ghazarian@chalhoub.com>  Please check if an insurance contract is required and proceed accordingly.

 

Thank you for your prompt attention to these matters.

 

Let me know if you need further information!

 

Best Regards,

RAMEZ ZEBDIE​​​​

SENIOR ASSOCIATE ‑ RSO

DUBAI

Dear Team,

 

Please find attached the layout file for the new storage room for Guess DMM. Kindly organize the following actions to meet the target completion date of 01st January 2025:

 

@Maitha <mailto:Maitha.Alhashmi@chalhoub.com>  Please arrange for the setup of shelves. Measurements, including rails and shelves, are to be confirmed by @Majdi <mailto:Majdi.Elhakam@chalhoub.com> .

@Joseph <mailto:Joseph.Diaz@chalhoub.com>  Please arrange the internet equipment. We need to move the BOH PC to the storage room and provide a new laptop for the BOH in-store, as requested by @Majdi <mailto:Majdi.Elhakam@chalhoub.com> .

@Philip <mailto:Philip.abdou@chalhoub.com>  Please arrange for the installation of the CCTV system.

@Hagop <mailto:Hagop.Ghazarian@chalhoub.com>  Please check if an insurance contract is required and proceed accordingly.

 

Thank you for your prompt attention to these matters.

 

Let me know if you need further information!

 

Best Regards,

RAMEZ ZEBDIE​​​​

SENIOR ASSOCIATE ‑ RSO

ALLIED ENTERPRISES LLC

DUBAI

‑

UNITED ARAB EMIRATES

+971 4 563 2000

+971504769298

Dear Team,

 

Please find attached the layout file for the new storage room for Guess DMM. Kindly organize the following actions to meet the target completion date of 01st January 2025:

 

@Maitha <mailto:Maitha.Alhashmi@chalhoub.com>  Please arrange for the setup of shelves. Measurements, including rails and shelves, are to be confirmed by @Majdi <mailto:Majdi.Elhakam@chalhoub.com> .

@Joseph <mailto:Joseph.Diaz@chalhoub.com>  Please arrange the internet equipment. We need to move the BOH PC to the storage room and provide a new laptop for the BOH in-store, as requested by @Majdi <mailto:Majdi.Elhakam@chalhoub.com> .

RAMEZ ZEBDIE​​​​

Dear Team,

 

Please find attached the layout file for the new storage room for Guess DMM. Kindly organize the following actions to meet the target completion date of 01st January 2025:

 

@Maitha <mailto:Maitha.Alhashmi@chalhoub.com>  Please arrange for the setup of shelves. Measurements, including rails and shelves, are to be confirmed by @Majdi <mailto:Majdi.Elhakam@chalhoub.com> .

@Joseph <mailto:Joseph.Diaz@chalhoub.com>  Please arrange the internet equipment. We need to move the BOH PC to the storage room and provide a new laptop for the BOH in-store, as requested by @Majdi <mailto:Majdi.Elhakam@chalhoub.com> .

@Philip <mailto:Philip.abdou@chalhoub.com>  Please arrange for the installation of the CCTV system.

@Hagop <mailto:Hagop.Ghazarian@chalhoub.com>  Please check if an insurance contract is required and proceed accordingly.

 

Thank you for your prompt attention to these matters.

 

Let me know if you need further information!

 

Best Regards,

RAMEZ ZEBDIE​​​​

SENIOR ASSOCIATE ‑ RSO

ALLIED ENTERPRISES LLC

DUBAI

Dear Team,

 

Please find attached the layout file for the new storage room for Guess DMM. Kindly organize the following actions to meet the target completion date of 01st January 2025:

 

@Maitha <mailto:Maitha.Alhashmi@chalhoub.com>  Please arrange for the setup of shelves. Measurements, including rails and shelves, are to be confirmed by @Majdi <mailto:Majdi.Elhakam@chalhoub.com> .

@Joseph <mailto:Joseph.Diaz@chalhoub.com>  Please arrange the internet equipment. We need to move the BOH PC to the storage room and provide a new laptop for the BOH in-store, as requested by @Majdi <mailto:Majdi.Elhakam@chalhoub.com> .

@Philip <mailto:Philip.abdou@chalhoub.com>  Please arrange for the installation of the CCTV system.

@Hagop <mailto:Hagop.Ghazarian@chalhoub.com>  Please check if an insurance contract is required and proceed accordingly.

 

Thank you for your prompt attention to these matters.

 

Let me know if you need further information!

 

Best Regards,

RAMEZ ZEBDIE​​​​

DUBAI

Dear Team,

 

Please find attached the layout file for the new storage room for Guess DMM. Kindly organize the following actions to meet the target completion date of 01st January 2025:

 

@Maitha <mailto:Maitha.Alhashmi@chalhoub.com>  Please arrange for the setup of shelves. Measurements, including rails and shelves, are to be confirmed by @Majdi <mailto:Majdi.Elhakam@chalhoub.com> .

@Joseph <mailto:Joseph.Diaz@chalhoub.com>  Please arrange the internet equipment. We need to move the BOH PC to the storage room and provide a new laptop for the BOH in-store, as requested by @Majdi <mailto:Majdi.Elhakam@chalhoub.com> .

@Philip <mailto:Philip.abdou@chalhoub.com>  Please arrange for the installation of the CCTV system.

@Hagop <mailto:Hagop.Ghazarian@chalhoub.com>  Please check if an insurance contract is required and proceed accordingly.

 

Thank you for your prompt attention to these matters.

 

Let me know if you need further information!

 

Best Regards,

RAMEZ ZEBDIE​​​​

SENIOR ASSOCIATE ‑ RSO

ALLIED ENTERPRISES LLC

DUBAI

‑

UNITED ARAB EMIRATES

+971 4 563 2000

+971504769298

Dear Team,

 

Please find attached the layout file for the new storage room for Guess DMM. Kindly organize the following actions to meet the target completion date of 01st January 2025:

 

@Maitha <mailto:Maitha.Alhashmi@chalhoub.com>  Please arrange for the setup of shelves. Measurements, including rails and shelves, are to be confirmed by @Majdi <mailto:Majdi.Elhakam@chalhoub.com> .

@Joseph <mailto:Joseph.Diaz@chalhoub.com>  Please arrange the internet equipment. We need to move the BOH PC to the storage room and provide a new laptop for the BOH in-store, as requested by @Majdi <mailto:Majdi.Elhakam@chalhoub.com> .

@Philip <mailto:Philip.abdou@chalhoub.com>  Please arrange for the installation of the CCTV system.

@Hagop <mailto:Hagop.Ghazarian@chalhoub.com>  Please check if an insurance contract is required and proceed accordingly.

 

Thank you for your prompt attention to these matters.

 

Let me know if you need further information!

 

Best Regards,

RAMEZ ZEBDIE​​​​
